callback_with_context.context_function_id: set.IsOnCooldown == false && ((selection.SelectedObjectList.IsEmpty && set.ActiveInitiatives.IsEmpty == false) || (selection.SelectedObjectList != set.ActiveInitiatives && set.CanActivateInitiatives( selection.SelectedObjectList ))) && (selection.SelectedObjectList.IsEmpty || PlayersFaction.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(selection.SelectedObjectList.Transform(CostContext).Reduce((acc, item) => acc.Add(item))))

hover.name: hover
hover.tooltip: Select this category to add forgecraft options to units supplied by this assembly line only. The [[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]]Armaments upkeep cost will be applied per unit owned from this category.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: No forgecraft options are currently unlocked for this unit category. Forge more Armoury stock for this category to unlock further options.

selected_hover.name: selected_hover
selected_hover.tooltip: Select this category to add forgecraft options to units supplied by this assembly line only. The [[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]]Armaments upkeep cost will be applied per unit owned from this category.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (target = Component("6E24E192-CB18-4BC2-88C00EF016E8F2EA"), margin_amnt = self.Dimensions.x / 2.0 - target.ChildList[0].Dimensions.x / 2.0) => { target.ListLayoutContext.SetMargins( ToVector( margin_amnt, margin_amnt - Component("D4ABC27F-36DE-4E8B-ABD4B44C4E9AF716").Dimensions.x)) }

InitiativeList .Filter(IsContextValid(InitiativeContext.UpkeepResourceTransactionContext)) .Sort(InitiativeContext.UpkeepResourceTransactionContext.PooledResourceTransactionList.FirstContext.Value, true) .Partition((IsActive == false && IsLocked && IsOnlyOnCooldown == false) == false)

Component("D4ABC27F-36DE-4E8B-ABD4B44C4E9AF716").CurrentSelection #little bit of a hack to propagate the initial empty selection of the parent. multiple context callbacks below need the CcoContextSelection before they can evaluate

GetIfElse( set.IsOnCooldown, Format(Loc("hellforge_confirm_cooldown"), set.RemainingCooldown), GetIfElse( selection.SelectedObjectList == set.ActiveInitiatives, Loc("hellforge_confirm_no_selection_hint"), GetIfElse( PlayersFaction.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(selection.SelectedObjectList.Transform(CostContext).Reduce((acc, item) => acc.Add(item))) == false, Loc("hellforge_confirm_cannot_afford"), GetIf( selection.SelectedObjectList.IsEmpty, Loc("hellforge_confirm_no_selection_hint")))))

set.IsOnCooldown || selection.SelectedObjectList == set.ActiveInitiatives || (selection.SelectedObjectList.IsEmpty == false && PlayersFaction.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(selection.SelectedObjectList.Transform(CostContext).Reduce((acc, item) => acc.Add(item))) == false)

component_text.text: dy_Schematics add an upkeep cost to each individual unit you own in a category

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Component("D4ABC27F-36DE-4E8B-ABD4B44C4E9AF716").CurrentSelection #little bit of a hack to propagate the initial empty selection of the parent. multiple context callbacks below need the CcoContextSelection before they can evaluate

(upkeep = GetIfElse( Component("6E24E192-CB18-4BC2-88C00EF016E8F2EA") .CurrentSelection .SelectedObjectList .FirstContext == this, Helforge.UnitUpkeepPredicted(this), Helforge.UnitUpkeep(Helforge.UnitsForInitiativeSet(this).FirstContext))) => { Format( Loc("hellforge_units_upkeep_summary"), GetIfElse(IsContextValid(upkeep), upkeep.AbsoluteValue, 0), Helforge.NumUnitsRecruitedForCategory(this.InitiativeSetContext.CategoryContext)) }

component_text.text:
[[img:unit_capacity]][[/img]] Increase total unit capacity within an Armoury category to unlock more Manufactory options.

[[img:icon_lord]][[/img]] Once forgecraft options are unlocked, add them to the categorys Manufactory assembly line to enhance all currently recruited units.

[[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]] Total Armaments upkeep for forgecraft options is based on the number of currently recruited units in a category.

dy_change_holder.componentleveltooltip: [[col:yellow]]You gain 1 Conclave Influence per turn per region you own.You can gain up to 5 additional Conclave Influence per turn from your Towers[[/col]]
